comment: took ece 4465 with him. dr bell is a super nice person and great teacher. his approach will feel kind of childish but he gives you the content regardless. takes forever to grade, but accessible outside of class and really nice.

Dr. Bell is a great professor. He makes sure that all his students understand that assignment and not let anyone fail in his class. He is always there to support his students. I would definitely take his class again.
Dr. Bell is a wonderful professor. His work can get intense, but it never feels as though he is giving your work just for work's sake. Everything that you learn will have a practical use.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Great Class! Very informative. I took this as an online course during the summer and the work was pretty easy, but still challenging. He is definitely an easy going guy. The assignments were meaningful and gave me the chance to learn and experience responsibility as an administrator.
Awesome teachers who really knows his stuff. Depending on the class there is a lot of work, but he grades pretty easy. Definitely a easy going guy.

When you sign up for Dr. Bell's class apparently you get his wife now instead. She has never taught a college course before and it's painfully obvious. He approves of your project, she says no. He gives you a due date and THREE days before the due date, she changes it. I used to love Dr. Bell, but now I will never sign up for his class again.

Amazing professor, would for sure take again. Many, many assignments but interesting & easy. Doesn't grade quickly, but when he does he's an easy grader. Very lenient as to when assignments need to be turned in. No tests, but tons of projects and a few papers. Really knows his information and has great stories to tell to make class interesting.
